law.text:
An established district may expand the geographic area of the district if:
a petition for inclusion is submitted from at least 80% of the owners of the total number of parcels of nonexempt property in the geographic area proposed for inclusion in the district;
the petition under item (1) of this subsection is accepted by a majority vote of the board of the district corporation; and
the appropriate documents, as applicable, are submitted under § 12-407 of this subtitle and a hearing is held under § 12-408 of this subtitle.
